page.title: 05WASHINGTON VILLAGE CENTRE
page.content: {THE SMITHY.}The Old Smithy is now called{Washington Studio Pottery.}It used to be a Blacksmith's. The Smithy is a very old ,historic building, open to the public.The Old Smithy offers a large selection of hand-thrown pottery.It also sells teas,oils,shampoos,herbs,spices,Bombay Mix and lots more.The Old Smithy is open 5 days a week.It is open on Monday,Wednesday,Thursday,Friday and Saturday.It opens at 9.15a.m.and the telephone number is 4177274. {HOLY TRINITY CHURCH.}The first thing you notice about the church is that it is old and it is built on a hill.The Venerable Bede (673-735)tells us how Pope Gregory advised Mellitus,his missionary to Britain in 601,to build churches on sites used for pagan worship. It is possible that this is such a site.
